line.comment: * SCRIPT NAME: Mayhem.GameCreator.RenegadeSetup
* DESCRIPTION: Allocates a renegade sector from an Unknown enclave and sets up the station there along with the Renegades Mission.
* If an appropriate sector is not found, the mission is disabled.
* AUTHOR: Mr Mordan
* DATE: 31 March 2024
* Add-Ons 1.4.24: Crystal rewards are now determined at the start of the game.
* Find an unknown enclave sector. -> $sector.
* if sector has 1 gate and is not our player sector.
* North id 0, South id 1 - North is positive direction
* Find gate destination, this will be our entry sector.
* Destroy the gate
* $t = 'Found and removing gate from system ' + $sector + ' to system ' + $destsector + ' ID: ' + $gateId
* START [NULL]-> call script 'Joubarbe.Lib.Infobox' : text=$t icon='no' timeout=0 fadeout=0
* START speak text: page=13 id=29 priority=10 "destroyed"

line.text: 'Ограничение карты: Не найдено ни одной незанятой системы-анклава для поддержки сюжета "Ренегаты". Пожалуйста, сгенерируйте новую карту, если хотите, чтобы сюжет "Ренегаты" был доступен.'

line.comment: * Create a station
* Add some wares to it for loot drop yummyness.
* Set Station Scripts
* Mark the sector as being our RenegadeSector. This also signifies that we found a valid sector to use and can enable the feature.
* Create an unusual scannable object in the entry sector for the player to find and scan. Record coordinates.
* debug only
* 30 = split dragon wreck (Kyle Brennan's destroyed ship)
* Retrieve a 4 digit random sequence
* Add-Ons 1.4: fixed off-by-one error.
* took out 0, O, I, 1 because they can be confused by the player and entered wrong. Just need an assortment of digits anyway.
* write to log file 1 append=[TRUE] printf: fmt='Fragment: %s', $RandomCodeFragment, null, null, null, null
* write to logfile 1 append=[TRUE] printf: fmt='Clue Prefixes Saved. %s', $CluePrefixes, null, null, null, null
* Hey %s, I forgot to give you part %s of the home system code. It's %s. Memorize it and erase it from your buffers.

* %s: Your authorization has been granted for system entry. Please use entry code %s. This information is need to know only and should be stored only in an approved Terracorp encrypted memory module. Do not fail us.

* This is Dispatch. The entry code has been set per data security guidelines and is now %s. Please memorize and purge this information from your computer log and communications buffer. Have a nice day.
* ** DEBUG **
*$t = 'crystals: ' + $crystalRewards
*write to player logbook $t
* ** END DEBUG **
* this is just used for loot drop rewards

sval.val: Ограничение карты: Не найдено ни одной незанятой системы-анклава для поддержки сюжета "Ренегаты". Пожалуйста, сгенерируйте новую карту, если хотите, чтобы сюжет "Ренегаты" был доступен.
Renegade Sector: %s
Renegade Entry Sector: %s
placing
at center of
Renegade Code: %s
SCRIPT NAME: Mayhem.GameCreator.RenegadeSetup
DESCRIPTION: Allocates a renegade sector from an Unknown enclave and sets up the station there along with the Renegades Mission.
If an appropriate sector is not found, the mission is disabled.
AUTHOR: Mr Mordan
DATE: 31 March 2024
Add-Ons 1.4.24: Crystal rewards are now determined at the start of the game.
Find an unknown enclave sector. -> $sector.
if sector has 1 gate and is not our player sector.
North id 0, South id 1 - North is positive direction
Find gate destination, this will be our entry sector.
Destroy the gate
$t = 'Found and removing gate from system ' + $sector + ' to system ' + $destsector + ' ID: ' + $gateId
START [NULL]-> call script 'Joubarbe.Lib.Infobox' : text=$t icon='no' timeout=0 fadeout=0
START speak text: page=13 id=29 priority=10 "destroyed"
Create a station
Add some wares to it for loot drop yummyness.
Set Station Scripts
Mark the sector as being our RenegadeSector. This also signifies that we found a valid sector to use and can enable the feature.
Create an unusual scannable object in the entry sector for the player to find and scan. Record coordinates.
debug only
30 = split dragon wreck (Kyle Brennan's destroyed ship)
Retrieve a 4 digit random sequence
Add-Ons 1.4: fixed off-by-one error.
took out 0, O, I, 1 because they can be confused by the player and entered wrong. Just need an assortment of digits anyway.
write to log file 1 append=[TRUE] printf: fmt='Fragment: %s', $RandomCodeFragment, null, null, null, null
write to logfile 1 append=[TRUE] printf: fmt='Clue Prefixes Saved. %s', $CluePrefixes, null, null, null, null
Hey %s, I forgot to give you part %s of the home system code. It's %s. Memorize it and erase it from your buffers.

%s: Your authorization has been granted for system entry. Please use entry code %s. This information is need to know only and should be stored only in an approved Terracorp encrypted memory module. Do not fail us.
This is Dispatch. The entry code has been set per data security guidelines and is now %s. Please memorize and purge this information from your computer log and communications buffer. Have a nice day.
** DEBUG **
$t = 'crystals: ' + $crystalRewards
write to player logbook $t
** END DEBUG **
this is just used for loot drop rewards
